title: Piece by Piece
plot: A vibrant journey through the life of cultural icon Pharrell Williams, told through the lens of LEGO animation.

subtitles.author: VikramJS
lines:

35076 38163 (electronic fanfare playing)
38204 40957 ♪ It's happening ♪

347013 349515 literally was mesmerizing to me.

371412 374040 It's called synesthesia.

374082 376751 It's not something that you see

380546 384675 ♪ Trying your best to bring
